hero.title: Explore Your Dreams with AI
hero.subtitle: DreamViewer helps you interpret, visualize, and understand your dreams using advanced artificial intelligence

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to explore your dreams

dreamInput.title: Dream Input
dreamInput.description: Simply describe your dream in beautiful, intuitive interface. Our AI will analyze and interpret it for you.

aiInterpretation.title: AI Interpretation
aiInterpretation.description: Get detailed analysis of your dreams including meaning, symbols, emotions, and visual representations.

dreamHistory.title: Dream History
dreamHistory.description: Keep track of all your dreams. Browse, search, and revisit your past dreams anytime.

dreamCategories.title: Smart Categories
dreamCategories.description: Automatically categorize your dreams as lucid, nightmare, recurring, or other types for easy organization.

aiChat.title: Chat with AI
aiChat.description: Have conversations with DreamViewer AI to dive deeper into your dreams and get personalized insights.

visualization.title: Dream Visualization
visualization.description: See your dreams come to life with AI-generated visual representations of your dream experiences.

showcase.title: See DreamViewer in Action
showcase.subtitle: Discover how DreamViewer transforms your dream experiences

screenshot1.title: Share Your Dream
screenshot1.description: Describe your dream in our beautiful interface with helpful tips for better interpretation

screenshot2.title: Dream Details & Interpretation
screenshot2.description: Get comprehensive AI analysis with categories, emotions, and key symbols identified

screenshot3.title: Dream History
screenshot3.description: Browse all your recorded dreams with beautiful AI-generated visualizations

screenshot4.title: Chat Conversations
screenshot4.description: Organize your dream discussions into separate chat threads for easy access

screenshot5.title: AI Dream Interpreter Chat
screenshot5.description: Have natural conversations with AI to explore your dreams in depth

screenshot6.title: Dream Visualization
screenshot6.description: See your dreams come to life with stunning AI-generated imagery

about.title: About DreamViewer AI
about.subtitle: Your personal dream interpreter powered by artificial intelligence
about.description: DreamViewer is an innovative AI-powered application that helps you explore, interpret, and visualize your dreams. Using advanced artificial intelligence, we transform your dream experiences into meaningful insights and beautiful visualizations.
about.mission: Our mission is to help you understand the hidden meanings in your dreams, track patterns over time, and gain deeper insights into your subconscious mind. Whether you're curious about a single dream or want to explore recurring themes, DreamViewer is here to guide you.

footer.description: DreamViewer AI - Your personal dream interpreter powered by artificial intelligence
